item.title: Claude Code Dev Loop for Grug Brained Developer
item.description:
Grug brain small. Claude brain also small. This collection of thoughts on using AI coding agents gathered by grug brain developer.

Grug think of one thing

One user story. One bug. One feature. Not ten thing. Grug brain hold one thing.

Grug give Claude context

Open Plan Mode. Tell Claude what want. Reference relevant files. Paste official doc for libraries/services. Screenshot if help. Grug not make Claude guess.

Claude ask. Grug answer.

Claude ask question about design. About edge case. About what mean.
